name: Euryale
description:
WARNING: This game contains flashing imagery!

Defend the Energy Spheres from the deadly forces of Euryale. Stop the enemy projectiles from reaching the energy spheres, once all the energy spheres are destroyed it's game over!

How to Play

  • Z to Fire
  • R to Restart Machine

Made for UGJ #52 Retro in 2.5 Hours, All Assets by Myself
